extendedInfo.description: Oil Units is a fast and accurate unit conversion application for the oil and gas industry. It has many features, including: Over 350 units categorized in four areas: drilling, production, fluid properties, and general. Full descriptions of units and their symbols. Energy equivalent units. A simple and beautiful interface, designed for the field: no Internet connection is required. Test-run the application on www.petroleumapps.com/oilunits.

reviews.title: Waste of money! !
reviews.comment: This app is only a unit converter. NOTHING more. There are plenty of free app that do the same and more.  Don\'t waste your money on this! !
reviews.author: Jeffery Delahoussaye
